'The prophecy is coming true. 
Every cuck loser who enters Trump’s proximity turns into a mega-shitlord.

Wow. 
Washington Post : 
Gingrich, on Fox in his role as a Donald Trump surrogate, had questioned the stories of women whoâ\x80\x99ve come forward to accuse Trump of sexual assault â\x80\x94 and the relative importance of the controversy itself, relative to Hillary Clintonâ\x80\x99s alleged misdeeds. 
Kelly pushed back. â\x80\x9cAs a media story, we donâ\x80\x99t get to say that 10 women are lying. We have to cover that story, sir,â\x80\x9d said the Fox anchor. 
â\x80\x9cSure. Okay,â\x80\x9d Gingrich said. â\x80\x9c So, so itâ\x80\x99s worth 23 minutes of the three networks to cover that story, and Hillary Clinton had a secret speech in Brazil to a bank that pays her 225,000 [dollars], saying her dream is an open border where 600 million people could come to America â\x80\x94 thatâ\x80\x99s not worth covering â\x80Ś â\x80\x9d 
â\x80\x9cThat is worth covering,â\x80\x9d interjected Kelly. â\x80\x9cAnd we did.â\x80\x9d 
Gingrich was still speaking: â\x80\x9c â\x80Ś I mean, you want to go back through the tapes of your show recently, you are fascinated with sex, and you donâ\x80\x99t care about public policy. â\x80\x9d 
â\x80\x9cMe? Really?â\x80\x9d she said, laughing. 
â\x80\x9cWell, thatâ\x80\x99s what I get out of watching you tonight,â\x80\x9d Gingrich said. 
Cue crosstalk. 
KELLY: â\x80\x9cYou know what, Mr. Speaker, Iâ\x80\x99m not fascinated by sex. But I am fascinated by the protection of women â\x80Śâ\x80\x9d

â\x80\x9cYeah, listen, itâ\x80\x99s not about me,â\x80\x9d Kelly said. â\x80\x9cItâ\x80\x99s about the women and men of America. And the poll numbers show us that the women of America, in particular, are very concerned about these allegations and, in large part, believe that they are a real issue. And donâ\x80\x99t dismiss the women â\x80Śâ\x80\x9d 
And: resume crosstalk.

GINGRICH: â\x80\x9cNo, I just want to hear you use the words. I want to hear you use the words â\x80\x98Bill Clinton, sexual predator.â\x80\x99 I dare you. [At that point, Gingrich was smiling slightly. Kelly was not.] â\x80\x9cSay â\x80\x98Bill Clinton, sexual predator.â\x80\x99â\x80\x9d

Weâ\x80\x99re going to have to leave it at that, and you can take your anger issues and spend some time working on them, Mr. Speaker. Thanks for being here.â\x80\x9d 
GINGRICH: â\x80\x9cAnd you, too.â\x80\x9d 
I haven’t seen a bitch get shut down like this since the 80s. I thought he was going to reach through the screen and start slapping her around, OLD SCHOOL. 
I hate this bitch so, so much. 
She alone is proof that women should never, under any circumstances, be allowed to leave the kitchen or speak with men who are not their husbands, fathers or brothers. 
Because really, as funny as this exchange was, it isn’t really about sex. If it was about sex, as Newt mentions, she could easily focus on Bill, who is a literal rapist. 
It is about sexism. 
Anti-male sexism by a feminist whore. 
Megyn [sic] Kelly should be in prison.'
